name: Inncorporeal
description:
Inncorporeal sees Tsubasa defending her family's hotel where upgraded decor also empowers her against invading specters.

We hope you enjoy your stay at Inncorporeal!

If you enjoyed our game, you can help us out by rating us here.

Inncorporeal is an entry for the cozy autumn game jam 2022.

Credits:

Art: DelinQvent
Sound: Cincachai : https://linktr.ee/cincachai
Programming: ASarevok :  https://asarevok.itch.io/
Gamejam organisers: Firith studio : https://firith.itch.io/

(outside resources: specter death - explosion by https://ansimuz.itch.io/)
